intro: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Gaganjot Shan, a Data Science enthusiast with a passion for Machine Learning and Data Analytics.
passion: I love turning data into actionable insights and crafting solutions that make a difference.
skills: I'm skilled in Python, TensorFlow, data visualization, and front-end development. I thrive on tackling tough problems and am always eager to learn something new.
explore: Take a look around and explore my work. And feel free to check out my resume!
personal: When I'm not working, you'll find me bouldering, gardening, experimenting in the kitchen, or learning something new.
goal: My goal is to contribute effectively to meaningful projects that make a positive impact. Feel free to explore my portfolio and discover how I bring my skills and passion to every endeavor.
